titles.title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to correct a high priority highway project for Ann Arbor, Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/24/1999--Introduced. Amends the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to make funds currently earmarked to replace the M-14-Barton Drive interchange in Ann Arbor, Michigan, available to conduct a study of alternatives to the interchange, including relocation on M-14 - U.S. 23 from Maple Road to Plymouth Road, mass transit options, and other means of reducing commuter traffic and improving highway safety.
